title: NYT's New Top Editor On Tumultuous Change-Over
teaser: Dean Baquet told NPR that his predecessor, Jill Abramson, was fired because of her failed relationship with senior management.
contentencoded:
In his first interview since taking over as executive editor of The New York Times, Dean BaquetÂ told NPR Media Correspondent David Folkenflik that his predecessor, Jill Abramson, was fired because of her failed relationship with senior management.

Folkenflik discusses the interview and The New York Times’ new leadership with Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson.

  • Hear David Folkenflik’s Morning Edition piece on David Baquet
  • See more media analysis from David Folkenflik

Guest

  • David Folkenflik, media correspondent for NPR. He tweets @davidfolkenflik.
